subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets’ offense pounded the Reds for 12 hits and six runs, and overcame a so-so start from Steven Matz to win, 6-4, on Thursday and take another step toward clinching the National League East.
snippet: The Mets’ offense pounded the Reds for 12 hits and six runs, and overcame a so-so start from Steven Matz to win, 6-4, on Thursday and take another step toward clinching the National League East.
